attributes.action: Legislation to tax MPs pay 100% at a threshold of the national living wage
attributes.additional_details:
A new tax that targets MPs specifically as a first step to quash any selfish, financial drives, and provide a better landscape to develop politicians with the nations interests at heart

The Brexit mess has thrown into focus how many poor decisions are made for political sleight of hand, the MPs expenses scandal has shown us hypocrisy, and the ignorance of even the largest petitions and demonstrations has shown us we have no recourse.

You do not represent us. Your wages are unjustified.
attributes.background: Leave or remain, labour or conservative, the UK public are embarrassed globally. MPs current wages are unjustified.

rejection.details: The Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA) is responsible for deciding on MPs' pay. IPSA is independent of both Parliament and Government.
